channel.title: [RS2]Essence Stealer - First Script, Need Some Help
channel.description:
I got really tired of my essences always getting stolen while Nature Crafting. So I made a script to steal them. The only problem is I don't know how to make it get repeating until I'm full. I'm going to make one later that actually sells them first, but right now I wanted to make this one, and get my damn 200 essences back. Oh and most of this was made from looking at Freddy1990's Ultimate Runebuyer. I knew nothing about Scar until today, so tell me how it is.
Edit: Oh and I know nothing about the Includes, I know the script I was looking at had includes but I don't know what they're for. If someone could help me with this as well it would be appreciated.

Bah, that runebuyer i made way back, it sux, I might redo it when i got time.

item.title: [RS2]Essence Stealer - First Script, Need Some Help
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

just change you checking system

in your main line you have

begin LoadBmps; check; buy; end.

for repetition change it to

begin repeat LoadBmps; check; buy; until(false) end.

and for it to check until your are full you could probably use something like

begin repeat; LoadBmps; buy; until(FindBitmapToleranceIn(essences,x1,y1, 694,428,727,459,2)=true); end.

i think that might work for you [though i am unexperienced]

try it and see

Read full topic
item.source: [RS2]Essence Stealer - First Script, Need Some Help
